formatDescription: SAS (Statistical Analysis System) is a statistical analysis software suite developed by SAS Institute. A SAS data file is a type of SAS data set that contains data values and descriptor information.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives

internalSignatures.name: SAS Data (Unix) 8.2
internalSignatures.note:
BOF: 32 byte binary magic {7} 0x31 = Unix {116} 'DATA' {53-61} '8.02'. 
Signature based extensively on unofficial description of DATA format, plus a wide variety of format samples: https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/sas7bdat/vignettes/sas7bdat.pdf
